availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to M. J. Holland. Father of J. P. Holland, S. A. Holland, M. E. Holland. Attended Medical School at the University of Nashville in Nashville, Tennessee, from 1854 to 1855. Physician in Marshall County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Briensburg, p. 5. Annual Announcement of the Law, Literary, and Medical Departments, of the University of Nashville: Session of 1854-5 (Nashville: John T. S. Fall, 1854), 20. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, District 2, p. 1.
